entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:31 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
